static String unescapeString (String string, char escape)

Detailed Description

Splits a string blob into individually accessible fields.

Author:
Cidana, Inc.
Version:
2.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.CSplitBlob ( String  blob,
char  escape 
)

Create a blob split class which can be used to extract individual fields.

Parameters:
blobis the string blob to split into individual fields.
escapeis the escape character.
com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.CSplitBlob ( String  blob)

Create a blob split class which can be used to extract individual fields.

No escape character is used (this is dangerous if one of the fields contains a tab or newline character.

Parameters:
blobis the string blob to split into individual fields.

Member Function Documentation

String com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.getItem ( int  indexRow,
int  indexCol 
)

Returns the item at a particular row and column index.

Parameters:
indexRowis the row index.
indexColis the column index.
Returns:
The item at nRow and nCol (zero based).
(null) if the index is out of bounds.
int com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.getNumberCols ( int  indexRow)

Get the number of column entries in that row.

Parameters:
indexRowis the row index.
Returns:
The number of column entries, or 0 if no entries.
int com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.getNumberRows ( )

Get the number of rows.

This will be the number of rows in a 2D string blob. A 1D string blob or a singleton blob will return 1.

Returns:
An integer with the number of rows.
String com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.getRow ( int  indexRow)

Get the row string.

Parameters:
indexRowis the row index.
Returns:
A string corresponding to the row index. Tabs and Newlines and escapes will not be removed.
boolean com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.isArray ( )

Checks if the blob is a 2D (array) type.

Returns:
true if an array, false if not.
void com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.print ( )

Prints the string blob in a consistent format.

static String com.cidana.cipl.CSplitBlob.unescapeString ( String  string,
char  escape 
) [static]

Unescapes the string by removing specific escape sequences.

No copying is done if there are no escapes in the string.
cEscape 't' goes to ''
cEscape 'n' goes to '
'
cEscape cEscape goes to cEscape.

Parameters:
stringis the string to unescape.
escapeis the escape character
Returns:
Unescaped string.
